meaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> of (odd-looking) <radical>lion</radical>s puts a <radical>drop</radical> of magic liquid on his face to look like a <radical>person</radical> who <kanji>resemble</kanji>s someone else. The leader of lions is going incognito, so he needs to resemble a person who is not himself. He takes this drop of powerful face paint and transforms.
readingMnemonic:
Now he <kanji>resemble</kanji>s an even greater leader, and all the lions get down on one <reading>knee</reading> (に) to pay their respects.

(Note that we recently changed this kanji's main reading from ね to に, because ね is an irregular reading.)
